name: Mastermind_Pets.Ghosts
display_help: Even when a person survives an encounter with a Ghost, he rarely escapes entirely unscathed. He will often find himself waking in the night, shuddering at the memory of a cold and lifeless touch.

powers.name: Mastermind_Pets.Ghosts.Resistance
powers.display_help: Souls are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Immobilize and Slow. They are also resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, and Toxic damage. They can cast Ghastly Blasts, Life Drain, and can hold foes with a Necroplasmic Grasp.
powers.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Immobilize, Slow, Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, Toxic

display_info: -4.0 immobilize protection, sleep protection for 10s on self
-4.0 immobilize protection, sleep protection for 10s on self
-4.0 immobilize protection, sleep protection for 10s on self
75.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff for 10s on self
75.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff for 10s on self
75.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff for 10s on self
26.14% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, cold damage, negative energy damage, toxic damage for 10s on self
26.14% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, cold damage, negative energy damage, toxic damage for 10s on self
26.14% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, cold damage, negative energy damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Mastermind_Pets.Ghosts.Phase_Shift
powers.display_help: Ghosts can Phase Shift into the negative plane and becomes out of sync with normal space. While Phase Shifted, they are in touch with their native plane and can regenerate quickly. Note that Phase Shift is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 100.0 only affect self for 7s on target
100.0 only affect self for 7s on target
100.0 only affect self for 7s on target
7 ticks of 57.83 heal over 6s on self
7 ticks of 77.10 heal over 6s on self
7 ticks of 96.38 heal over 6s on self

powers.name: Mastermind_Pets.Ghosts.Ghastly_Blast
powers.display_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by a Ghastly Blast. Note that Ghastly Blast is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Mastermind_Pets.Ghosts.Life_Drain
powers.display_help: The Ghost has drained your life to heal herself. Your chance to hit is reduced. Note that Life Drain is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 1 ticks of 115.66 heal for 1s on self after 0.5s delay
1 ticks of 154.21 heal for 1s on self after 0.5s delay
1 ticks of 192.76 heal for 1s on self after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Mastermind_Pets.Ghosts.Enchant
powers.display_help: This Ghost has been Enchanted. It can now cast Life Drain.

powers.name: Mastermind_Pets.Ghosts.Necroplasmic_Grasp
powers.display_help: The Ghost has enveloped you in it's Necroplasmic Grasp. You are Held as your life is drained. Note that Necroplasmic Grasp is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 10 ticks of 2.75 negative energy damage over 9.1s on target after 0.5s delay
10 ticks of 3.36 negative energy damage over 9.1s on target after 0.5s delay
10 ticks of 3.98 negative energy damage over 9.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Mastermind_Pets.Ghosts.Empower
powers.display_help: This Ghost has been Empowered. It can now cast Necroplasmic Grasp.
